interview_tips: so I am posting her secrets because I like validation from strangers
to make them understand you won’t just take any job, and that it must fit with what you feel is a good job
on Storytelling that I really like: **Make it small to make it big
the book Stories Sell by Matthew dicks
thinking about those soft skills you want to highlight (for me in this role: problem definition, detail work, building trust) and ask yourself “how ha
doing (and not doing) to gauge the technical acumen of a candidate
call the company, follow up, and give a firm handshake
me, nor does he work at the company

red_flags: possible, to drive urgency and demonstrate that you are a scarce resource
overfluff with 'imgagery' details - be direct on what happened, the mind will fill in the details
have enough data to determine if X or O has won
bombed an interview this bad but I guess after 10 years I was due to bomb an interview eventually
be upset if you freeze during interviews, it happens to everyone
want to spend time training you when another applicant can have everything
